## StencilState.setWriteMask() method

Sets the bit mask for writing to the stencil buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
setWriteMask(mask: number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mask | number | The write mask |

this
